name: Hound Blaze

trigger.text: Return a character with a cost of 3 or less to its owner's hand.

text: Main: Up to 1 of your leaders or characters gains +3000 Power this turn. Then, place a character with 2 or less cost on the bottom of its owner's deck.

effect.text: Up to 1 of your leaders or characters gains +3000 Power this turn. Then, place a character with 2 or less cost on the bottom of its owner's deck.
Return a character with a cost of 3 or less to its owner's hand.
